name: FOX ADVENTURE ~HOMEWARD JOURNEY~
description:
Everyone was on their way back home when suddenly there was a dramatic change in the sky and the earth. Homes were lifted into the sky, roads were torn apart, and monsters appeared everywhere...

In a cartoon-style setting, countless perils lie hidden.
The path leading back home is filled with countless dead ends.
With a heart full of challenges, when will the storm finally pass and the sun shine again?
Achievements of omniscience and omnipotence are attained through honing one's skills.

* You can use the jump if you haven't used it since leaving the ground.
* Obtaining a cherry allows you to jump again.
* The sprint ability requires obtaining specific items.
* The angle of the sprint can be adjusted based on the duration of pressing the directional keys.
* If interested, you can refer to the original meaning in Chinese.
